item.description:
Ladies & Gentlemen,

Are you looking for a way to get outdoors, run around a little, and/or play flag-football. We have a great group of people that regularly play, and we're always looking for new people to join us. We have a blast, and our main goal is to have fun. We will continue to play despite weather conditions. I hope that you can make it!

Please respond whether you will be attending, even if you cannot make it.

Thanks,

Flag-footballers
item.why: We have a lot of fun, and it doesn't matter how good or bad you are. It doesn't even matter if you know the rules. We'll help you out and have a great time.
item.name: Flag Football - Saturday 2PM - Cambridge Common
